sentence: See the ad from One Georgia below: “📺WATCH📺 Brian Kemp keeps taking us back… on guns, on abortion, and even a massive tax giveaway… for himself. Georgians deserve a governor who will move us forward – not a guy stuck🕹in🦕the📼past.
author: Sarah K. Burris
title: Pro-Stacey Abrams group comes out swinging against Brian Kemp in first campaign ad
